subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Struggling to win, and often coming close, has been the story of Cadel Evans’s career. Once again, Evans is watching his chances to win the Tour de France fade.
snippet: Struggling to win, and often coming close, has been the story of Cadel Evans’s career. Once again, Evans is watching his chances to win the Tour de France fade.
